about.title: Full Stack Developer
about.intro: I turn technical challenges into concrete solutions. I focus on optimizing processes, enhancing user experiences, and generating real business value through efficient, scalable technology.
about.actual_job: As a Senior Full Stack Developer at LANEC, I lead systems modernization through robust architecture, automation, and DevOps practices. I specialize in solving complex problems, anticipating needs, and guiding technical decisions that improve operations and scale results.
about.thinking: I believe in constant evolution as a life philosophy. Learning, adapting, and moving forward with intention drive the way I work. I'm inspired by cinema, mental challenges, and discovering new ideas while riding my bike.

projects.title: BotExpress
projects.description: Intelligent virtual assistant for WhatsApp that automates customer support. Integrates OpenAI and Mongoose to handle contextual responses and store interactions, optimizing communication flow.

projects.title: BlogExpress
projects.description: Technical content platform built with the MERN stack. Offers a seamless reading experience and an optimized article management system for sharing web development knowledge.

projects.title: ChatExpress
projects.description: High-availability real-time messaging system. Uses Socket.io and a RESTful architecture to ensure instant and secure communication between users, with persistence in SQL Server.

projects.title: ClimaExpress
projects.description: Interactive weather dashboard consuming WeatherApi. Presents accurate climate data in a clean, modern interface, prioritizing user experience and load speed.

footer.title: What's Next?
footer.heading: Get In Touch
footer.text: I am currently open to new projects and freelance opportunities. Whether you have an interesting idea or just want to say hi, my inbox is always open!
